mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply ( rno, bno, reply, replyer, gno, sno, depth ) VALUES ( seq_reply.nextval, #{ bno }, #{ reply }, #{ replyer }, seq_reply.currval, 1, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate, gno, sno, depth, deleted FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{ bno } ORDER BY gno DESC, sno ASC
